content: this ribbed beanie hat is really easy to knit and will go with anything this ribbed hat pattern is an excellent project for advanced beginners not too bulky and not too light this hat is comfortable to wear on any occasion and it is unisex too yarn 1 x the petite wool in olive from we are knitters each ball is 100 gr per 140 m 100% peruvian wool the yarn weight is bulky/chunky/12 ply needles set of 6mm us 10 16″ circular knitting needles you may also need a set of 6mm us 10 double-pointed needles for the decreases skills level easy this is an easy level knitting pattern and the techniques involved are the knit stitch purl stitch k2tog p2tog and knitting in the round sizing newborn/baby 0-3 months - 13-15 baby 3-12 months - 15-18 1-2 years toddler - 18-19 3-12 years child - 19-21 teen/adult small - 21-22 adult medium - 22-24 adult large - 24-26 don t forget to follow handy little me on social media for more updates and to share your finished projects instagram @handylittleme facebook facebook com/handylittleme ravelry ravelry com/people/handylittleme pinterest pinterest co uk/handylittleme copyright the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of handy little me this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern or any items created using the directions in this pattern without consent please visit my terms of use page for additional information 1 https //www handylittleme com/easy-beginner-hat-knitting-pattern/ 2 https //www handylittleme com/product/ribbed-beanie-hat-pattern-unisex/
